Title: Rock and Stone
Description:
Earth elementals in the Dragon Isles are composed of various rocks and minerals. Our blacksmiths are thoroughly fascinated with the unique tools they are able to manufacture from smelting such materials. In fact, they appear to have smelted the last of their samples.

I would hate to ruin their fun. Would you mind replenishing the supply?
ObjectivesText: Gather 15 Earthen Samples from the earth elementals of the Dragon Isles for Dhurrel of the Maruuk Centaurs.
